snippet: An archaeological team and a documentary crew get stuck in an ancient Egyptian tomb in “The Pyramid,” starring Denis O’Hare and Ashley Hinshaw.
abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews movie The Pyramid, directed by Gregory Levasseur.
lead_paragraph: An archaeological team and a documentary crew get stuck in an ancient Egyptian tomb in “The Pyramid,” starring Denis O’Hare and Ashley Hinshaw.

headline.print_headline: Don’t Say That Word (It Might Come True)
